metadata.comments: This Fortinet custom connector uses Fortinet-Fortigate API to perform different actions on Forinet VM
metadata.author: Ashok M C,Fortinet

metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace

uiDefinition.description: The API Key for this api

properties.description: Connector to FortiNet and FortiGate API's

info.title: Default title
info.description: Connector to FortiNet and FortiGate API's

start-mac.description: Starting mac address of address object
start-mac.title: start-mac

allow-routing.description: allow routing object is enable or disable
allow-routing.title: allow-routing

get.description: action used to fetch details all address objects

mkey.description: Name of the address object created
mkey.title: mkey

post.description: action used to create a new address object

type.description: Type of address.ipmask:Standard IPv4 address with subnet mask. fqdn:Fully Qualified Domain Name address.
type.title: address type

start-ip.description: start range of IPv4 addresses between two specified addresses (inclusive)
start-ip.title: start-ip

end-ip.description: end range of IPv4 addresses between two specified addresses (inclusive)
end-ip.title: end-ip

fqdn.description: Please provide the URL for ex gmail.com if type=fqdn
fqdn.title: URL address

http_method.description: http_method used to call the API
http_method.title: http_method

get.description: action used to create a new address groups

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: enter the address object name to filter (e.g. member=@10.10.10.09)

mkey.description: Group name which address object is added
mkey.title: mkey

status.description: Status code of the API call
status.title: status

http_status.description: Status of the "IP add to an address object" action
http_status.title: http_status

put.description: Action is used to add/remove an address object to an address group

member.description: Enter the whole array of members i.e existing and also new ones
member.title: member

put.summary: Add an URL to an address group
put.description: Action used to add an URL to an address group

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: please provide the name address group

end-mac.description: end-mac address of the address object
end-mac.title: end-mac

vdom.description: virtual domain of an address object
vdom.title: vdom

get.description: Action used to fetch the details of particular address object

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Please enter address object name which you like get details
